Wild.

Daily Market Brief:
northmantrader.com/2025/10/0‚Ä¶

2/2

The orange line represents the median Q3 2025 GDP forecast, compiled from a survey of 61 economists conducted by Bloomberg. Currently, it is at 2.06%. The orange area is the highest to the lowest forecast.

The blue line represents the Atlanta Fed's GDPNow see above). It is still higher than the highest guess on Wall Street (above the orange area). This disconnect has persisted for over a month now (the actual data is higher than any forecast on Wall Street).

Now that we are solidly into a government shutdown, this will not change. The last reading from the GOVERNMENT data was a robust economy.

1/2

The Atlanta Fed GDPnow was updated today. 

Unchanged at 3.8%. The only update was based on the New Orders from the non-manufacturing (or services) ISM report. The rest of the update did not happen because it was government data.

They also noted that this series will not be updated again until the Government reopens and data starts getting released again.

For the moment, we are currently stuck at 3.8% on this metric.

The AI Business Model?

*NVIDIA IS AMONG EQUITY INVESTORS IN MUSK'S XAI CHIP DEAL

*MUSK‚ÄôS XAI NEARS $20 BILLION CAPITAL RAISE TIED TO NVIDIA CHIPS

The AI boom/bubble now has the S&P 500 and the Nasdaq 100 (QQQ) with the same eight largest stocks (table).

These two indices are merging into the same thing.

In the last week, some heavy hitters have warned about an AI bubble.

Jeff Bezos = Amazon 
David Solomon = Goldman Sachs
Roger McNamee = Elevation Partners

And below is Sam Altman, Founder of OpenAI (ChatGPT)

From the article ‚Ä¶
‚Äî‚Äî

Of course, when Altman makes these prophecies about AI, he‚Äôs also hyping it up. And perhaps part of why he can seem so nonplussed about impending catastrophes, financial or existential, is that he‚Äôs convinced that his company will be the one that comes out the other side stronger.

Right after warning of a bubble in August, Altman acknowledged that ‚Äúsomeone‚Äù will lose a ‚Äúphenomenal amount of money,‚Äù but that, of course, ‚Äúwe don‚Äôt know who.‚Äù
‚Äî‚Äî-

In other words, when the AI bubble pops, it will be ugly ‚Ä¶ for other people but not them. 

In fact, not only are they sure they will survive, but they want the bubble to pop because they think it will eliminate competition (so they can raise their monthly subscription fees) and even pick up cheap assets. 

They think the AI bubble popping means they win.

Good luck with this thinking.

In today's Early Look: "Running Your ETF Portfolio"

Here‚Äôs how to think about our popular ETF Pro product (i.e. what I‚Äôm doing and most importantly, when):

A) WHEN a new position gets added to ETF Pro, that means I added it to my family‚Äôs portfolios

B) WHEN I add something on the Long Side, that means its at or near the LRR (low-end of the Risk Range‚Ñ¢ Signal)

C)  WHEN I subtract something from the Long Side, that means I sold ALL of it because it broke TRADE and/or TREND
